judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
This Decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Rhodes of the Superior Court. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Raymond M. Remido, with him Saul, Ewing, Remido é Saul, for appellant.
Thomas Raeburn White, with him W. Wilson White and White & Williams, for appellee.
